about_the_game:
An RPG with an Endless Story!

Beyond The Tales is a classic turn-based RPG with a twist! It's about 4 characters that are looking for the meaning of their existence in a very strange world but if they do the world will end.

After the main story is finished, the game will open new paths to a forever expanding world of custom fan made maps, characters and quests, all bonded together by nothing more than the will of the players to give these 4 characters more adventures to experience. Each new map will have its own original music made by the team.

GAMEPLAY

Classic turn-based battle with only 2 commands: skills and items. This battle has a unique factor, since all the skills use energy and you have only one skill that doesn´t requiere energy but can help you to fill the bar. Each character has a set of very unique skills that combine with the other characters. For example, Aham has Stocade which is a skill that hits very strong but drains all the energy bar at the beginning of the game. Then you have Transfusion, which will take 1/4 of your health for filling your energy bar and also you have healing stab which hits for very low energy cost and recovers 1/4 of your health bar. So if you combine this you won't require to use items to continue playing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A turn-based RPG about some friends that want to discover the meaning of their existence, but if they do, the world will end. This game will break the story to enter to a surreal aftergame experience.
